Title: About Us
Description:
Objective

Mu’alim Al-Qur’an is a self-teaching and self-learning aid of the Qur’an based on modern media platforms. It encompasses all essential aspects of Qur’anic knowledge which is obligated to every Muslim. Its usage also extends to the conventional Qur’an schools as an aid to more efficient and richer learning experience. reducing learning cycle, increasing teaching capacity, and enhancing pupils’ knowledge of the Qur’an from just being learning to recite and memorize the Qur’an to understanding the recitation (tajweed) rules, meanings of the Qur’an, and the language of the Qur’an.



Development plan

The website www.mualim-alquran.com is the first stage of the development of Mu’alim Al-Qur’an. This first stage is a web-based solution that is accessible online for free through any internet appliance like a PC/Laptop (Mac or Windows), tablets (Apple or Android) and mobile phones (iPhone or Android). In all the appliances, the screen of this web-based Mu’alim Al-Qur’an adjusts perfectly and automatically to suit the appliance’s resolution.



In the second stage Mu’alim Al-Qur’an will be developed to a downloadable mobile application on both iPhone and Android platforms. This mobile app will be accessible offline and will enable users to access all the functionalities and content of the Mu’alim Al-Qur’an without the need to be online through WiFi or mobile data connectivity.



In the third stage Mu’alim Al-Qur’an will be developed to a built-in app in a dedicated branded tablet with all its functionalities and content, thus enabling its accessibility without the need of internet connectivity. Furthermore, the tablet will be equipped with a solar charger which will allow users to access Mu’alim Al-Qur’an without the need of external electricity supply.



Target Audience

Mu’alim Al-Qur’an is primarily intended for non-Arabic speaking Muslims who speak any of the following languages. Swahili, English, French, German, Spanish and Italian. The application is equally useful in self-teaching and self-learning of the Qur’an for any speakers of these languages



Scope

Mu’alim Al-Qur’an includes the following six learning modules: (1) Foundation of Arabic alphabets, letters, and words based on standard Qaida Al-Noorania. (2) Recitation of the Qur’an word-by-word and verse-by-verse. (3) Rules of Tajweed in recitation. (4) Memorization of the Qur’an based on the standard memorization methodology of repetition and tracking progress. (5) The meaning of the Qur’an through translations. and (6) Arabic as the language of the Qur’an.



User’s Engagement

Mu’alim Al-Qur’an allows users to access the application for free through the browsers or mobile application in phones or tablets. The users have a choice to use the application anonymously without tracking their progress or by logging in with an email address and a password to keep track of their progress within a particular stage or between stages. The interaction with Mu’alim Al-Qur’an is made with simple interfaces using touchscreen.
DescriptionSwa:
Lengo

“Mu’alim Al-Qur’an” ni kisaidizi cha kujifunza mwenyewe Qur’ani kwa kutumia vyombo vya kisasa. Kisaidizi hichi kimejumuisha vipengele vyote muhimu vya elimu ya Qur’ani ambayo imewajibika kwa kila Muislamu. Matumizi yake yanaweza pia kuwa katika vyuo vya Qur’ani na kuwa ni kisaidizi cha kukifanya kisomo chenye ufanisi na tajiriba nzuri ya kujifunza; kupunguza muda wa kisomo, kuongeza kadiri ya usomeshaji na kuikuza elimu ya wanafunzi ya Qur’ani kuanzia kwa kujifunza kusoma tu na kuihifadhi Qur’ani hadi kuzifahamu kanuni za tajwidi, maana za Qur’ani na lugha ya Qur’ani.



Mpango wa Kuiendeleza

Tovuti www.mualim-alquran.com ni hatuwa ya mwanzo katika kuiendeleza Mu’alim Al-Qur’an. Hatuwa hii ya mwanzo ni hiyo ya kuweka tovuti isiyo na malipo kupitia chombo chochote chenye mtandao kama vile kompyuta (Mac au Windows), tableti (Apple au Android), na simu za mkono (Apple au Android). Katika vyombo vyote hivyo, sura ya Mu’alim Al-Qur’an hujirekebisha wenyewe kufuatana na kiwango cha eneo la skrini.



Katika hatuwa ya pili Mu’alim Al-Qur’an itaendelezwa katika programu (application) itumikayo katika vyombo vya iPhone na Android. Programu hii itaweza pia kutumika bila ya kuingia mtandao, na itawezesha matumizi yote ya Mu’alim Al-Qur’an na yote yaliyomo bila ya kuwa na haja ya kuingia katika mtandao.



Katika hatuwa ya tatu Mu’alim Al-Qur’an itaendelezwa kwa kujengwa ndani ya tableti mahususi kwa kazi hiyo tu. Tableti hiyo itakuwa na yote yaliyomo ndani ya Mu’alim Al-Qur’an na utumiaji wake, bila ya kuwa na haja ya mtandao. Na zaidi ya hivyo, tableti hiyo itajengewa chaja itumiyayo nguvu za jua na kuwezesha kuitumia Mu’alim Al-Qur’an bila ya haja ya kuunga na umeme.



Waliokusudiwa

Kimsingi, Mu’alim Al-Qur’an imekusidiwa kwa wale Waislamu wasiozungumza Kiarabu na wanaozungumza yoyote kati ya lugha zifwatazo: Kiswahili, Kiingereza, Kifaransa, Kijarumani na Kitaliana. Programu hii pia inawafaa wowote wanaozungumza lugha hizo kujifunza wenyewe kusoma Qur’ani.



Yaliyomo

Mu’alim Al-Qur’an imejumuisha mada sita zifuatazo: (1) Msingi wa alfabeti ya Kiarabu, herufi na maneno yake kutokana na kawaida ya “Qaida Al-Noorania”. (2) Usomaji wa Qur’ani neno kwa neno na aya kwa aya. (3) Kanuni za Tajwidi katika usomaji. (4) Kuhifadhi Qur’ani kwa nidhamu ya kikawaida ya kukariri na kufwatilia maendeleo yake. (5) Maana ya Qur’ani. (6) Kiarabu, lugha asili ya Qur’ani.



Mwingiliano na watumiaji

Mu’alim Al-Qur’an iwazi na bure kwa watumizi wake kupitia mtandao au programu katika simu za mkono na tableti. Watumizi wake wana hiari ya kuitumia programu bila ya kujisajili na bila ya kufwatilia maendelo yao; au kwa kujisajili na anuwani pepe na neno la siri ili kufwatilia maendeleo yao katika hatua fulani au baina ya hatuwa. Mwingiliano na Mu’alim Al-Qur’an umefanywa kwa njia nyepesi kutumia skrini ya kugusa.
DescriptionFr:
Objectif

Mu'alim Al-Qur'an est une aide à l'apprentissage d'une manière autodidacte du Coran par le biais de plateformes médiatiques modernes. Cela englobe tous les aspects essentiels de la connaissance coranique qui est obligatoire pour chaque musulman. Son utilisation s'étend également aux écoles coraniques conventionnelles, en tant qu'aide pour une expérience d'apprentissage plus efficace et plus riche; réduire le cycle d'apprentissage, augmenter la capacité d'enseignement et améliorer la connaissance du Coran pour les élèves , allant du simple fait d'apprendre à réciter et à mémoriser le Coran à la compréhension des règles de récitation (tajweed), des significations du Coran et de la langue.



Plan de développement

Le site www.mualim-alquran.com est la première étape du développement de Mu'alim Al-Qur'an. Cette première étape est une solution Web accessible en ligne gratuitement via n'importe quel appareil ~Internet~ *tel qu' un-PC/ordinateur portable (Mac ou Windows), des tablettes (Apple ou Android) et des smartphones (iPhone ou Android). Sur tous les appareils, l'affichage de ~ce~ Mu'alim Al-Qur'an ~basé sur le Web~ s'adapte parfaitement et automatiquement à la résolution de ceux ci*.



Dans la deuxième étape, Mu'alim Al-Qur'an sera développé en une application mobile téléchargeable sur les plateformes iPhone et Android. Cette application mobile sera accessible hors ligne et permettra aux utilisateurs d'accéder à toutes les fonctionnalités et au contenu de Mu'alim Al-Qur'an sans avoir besoin d'être en ligne via ~le~ WiFi ou la connectivité des données mobiles.



Dans la troisième étape, Mu'alim Al-Qur'an sera développé en une application intégrée dans une tablette de marque dédiée avec toutes ses fonctionnalités et son contenu, permettant ainsi également son accessibilité sans connexion via Internet. De plus, la tablette sera équipée d'un chargeur solaire qui permettra aux utilisateurs d'accéder à Mu'alim Al-Qur'an sans avoir besoin d'une alimentation électrique externe.



Public ciblé

Mu'alim Al-Qur'an est principalement destiné aux musulmans non arabophones qui parlent l'une des langues suivantes; swahili, anglais, français, allemand, espagnol et italien. L'application est utile pour l'auto-apprentissage du Coran pour tous les locuteurs de ces langues.



Portée

Mu'alim Al-Qur'an comprend les six modules d'apprentissage suivants: (1) Fondation de l'alphabet, lettres et mots arabes basés sur la norme Qaida Al-Noorania ; (2) Récitation du Coran mot à mot et verset par verset ; (3) Règles du Tajweed en récitation ; (4) Mémorisation du Coran basée sur la méthodologie standard de mémorisation par répétition et du suivi des progrès ; (5) La signification du Coran à travers les traductions ; et (6) l'arabe comme langue du Coran.



Engagement de l'utilisateur

Mu'alim Al-Qur'an permet aux utilisateurs d'accéder gratuitement à l'application via les navigateurs ou l'application mobile sur les téléphones ou ~les~ tablettes. Les utilisateurs ont le choix d'utiliser l'application de manière anonyme sans suivre leur progression ou en se connectant avec une adresse e-mail et un mot de passe pour suivre leur progression à une étape particulière. L'interaction avec Mu'alim Al-Qur'an se fait par le biais d' interfaces simples nécessitant l'usage de l'écran tactile.

Title: Security & Privacy Policy
Description:
We are committed to our obligation to protect the privacy rights of all our website visitors.

The Security & Privacy policy addresses our practices which are related to data collection & usage of your personal information.


Information Collection & Usage

We do not collect any personal information about you, when you visit our web site, unless otherwise specified or you choose to provide this information to us.

However, upon your visit the following information are automatically collected and stored:

  • The IP address, from which you access the Internet
  • The date and time of your access to our website
  • The pages you visited (recorded by the text and graphics files that compose the page)
We use this information solely for statistical and monitoring purposes and to help us identify which services are most or least interesting to our visitors, as well as to monitor the website performance.

We may use third party consultants, tools, or software for conducting statistical analysis; however please note that only certain pieces of aggregated, non-personal information, such as the number of users who accessed our website, or pages most visited etc. are collected. Such information does not identify you individually. We keep all collected information confidential except where disclosure is enforced or required by law, or as part of requirement to protect our rights and intellectual properties.


Security of Transactions

We have implemented generally accepted standards of technology and operational security. Please be assured that this site has security measures in place to protect the information you provide us. We use encryption methods to protect all information, which is deemed to be sensitive, or any other data that should remain secure to meet the legal requirements.


Links to third-party websites

Our website may provide links to other web sites. However, we are not responsible for the following:

  • Accuracy of the contents of these other sites
  • Their mechanisms for information collection and usage
If you connect to any other site through our website, you need to read its Security & Privacy Policy to determine its practices related to information collection and usage.


Security & Privacy Policy Changes

We reserve the right to change this Security & Privacy Policy at any time. The amended version of the Security & Privacy Policy will be always published on this website.


Privacy Intrusion

If you doubt that your privacy is being compromised during the access of this website, do:

  • Close all tabs and windows you are browsing our website with.

Title: Terms of Use
Description:

By continuing to use the Site and/or any of the services shown on the Site, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

No warranties of any kind, implied, express, or statutory, including but not limited to the warranties of non-infringement of third-party rights, title, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and freedom from computer virus, are given in conjunction with the information and materials.

We shall not be subject to any obligations of confidentiality or privacy regarding submitted information except as agreed or as otherwise specifically agreed or required by law.

These terms and conditions are subject to change and can be modified at any time without notice.

By accessing this website and obtaining the facilities, products or services offered through this website, you agree that the law of the Sultanate of Oman shall govern such access and the provision of such facilities, products and services and you agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Sultanate of Oman.


Disclaimer

www.mualim-alquran.com is not responsible for any technical, hardware or software failures of any kind; lost or unavailable network connections; incomplete, garbled, or delayed transmissions. It assumes no liability for any direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, consequential, or psychological damages because of visiting or using its website or loss of services, income or welfare resulting from any virus that may infect computer equipment used to access its sites. Under no circumstances will www.mualim-alquran.com be liable for any damages or injury that result from the use of the materials on this site and the user shall indemnify www.mualim-quran.com from and against all liabilities resulting from the user's failure to observe these terms and conditions. www.mualim-alquran does not warrant that information currently accessible is up to date.

Title: Accessibility
Description:
As part of our efforts to reach people with limited mobility and accessibility, we have designed this website with enhanced features that will ease the experience of browsing our website.
Following are some of the features on our website that aim to benefit people with different abilities:

  • Web Standards
  • Zoom Screen
  • Alternate text for images


WEB STANDARDS

www.mualim-alquran.com follows W3C Web Standards to maintain the website structure, navigation, look and feel.


ZOOM SCREEN

You can use the Zoom option from your browser to enlarge the page. You can change the page size by clicking on the View menu. Then, click on Zoom and adjust the page size according to your needs.


ALTERNATE TEXT FOR IMAGE

Every image on our website tagged with appropriate description. To read image description, you need to position the mouse over the image.
